@ColesStreetPothole yeesh. sending you cool breezes. from somewhere? not here, sadly. it's drier here now thankfully, but we're into the 90s and haven't had rain for months. bleh. meant to be over 100 on sunday again too. yuck yuck.

descendants.content:
@Beedazzled we had nearly 9 months of rain, but now we haven't had any since early june i think. maybe it rained once for a bit? everything is drying up and dying, and we're forecast 40° again on sunday.
bah.

i hope you get some sunshine. but not too much!
